snippet: A study finds that even successful business owners can make poor decisions when it comes to so-called passion investments like vineyards, baseball teams and racehorses.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column contends that investors are often reluctant to sell their stakes in passion investments; cites study from Barclays Wealth and Investment Management that points out the risks of emotional investing.
lead_paragraph: A study finds that even successful business owners can make poor decisions when it comes to so-called passion investments like vineyards, baseball teams and racehorses.

headline.print_headline: In Investments, As in Life, Passion Can Cloud Judgment
headline.seo: In Investments, as in Life, Passion Can Cloud Judgment
headline.main: In Investments, as in Life, Passion Can Cloud Judgment
